lenders.name: Emmanuel
lenders.loan_because:
I am a boy in Acca, Ghana - West Africa. I stays alone with my mother. Since the death of my dad I have not been able to solve any monetery matter eg. Bills, Fees, Levis.etc.....
And this is hapening because my mother is also not employed.
So please I need a loan to my mother for her to work with that money so that I may also get payed to my bills and the rest. Because this has been an huge situation unto us. 
Please I call the name of the LIVING GOD that whosoever helps me, the GOD ALMIGHTY's Hand will shine on that person and also HE will protect that person forever and ever.
For blessings be your portion the one who reads this and feels mercy and piety for me..May the Great God Almighty also have mercy upon you....

lenders.loan_because: "All that is not given is lost." -Indian Proverb
lenders.occupational_info:
I take care of my mind, body, and spirit, while on a spiritual retreat from life comparable to the book and movie, Eat Pray Love.  When folks ask what I do, my practiced response is "My current phase in life is to learn the art of doing nothing, simply Being and living in the present moment to love and to be loved, always searching for Truth."

My email is edgaram@hotmail.com if you ever wish to contact me.

“My grace is sufficient for you, for power is made perfect in weakness.” So, I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may dwell in me. Therefore I am content with weaknesses, insults, hardships, persecutions, and calamities for the sake of Christ; for whenever I am weak, then I am strong. -2 Corinthians 12:9-10
